Review.subject: Mathematics
Review.reviews: Dr. Smith explains concepts clearly and is always willing to help.

Review.subject: Computer Science
Review.reviews: She is extremely knowledgeable and makes the lectures interesting.

Review.subject: Physics
Review.reviews: The lectures are sometimes hard to follow, but he's helpful during office hours.

Review.subject: Biology
Review.reviews: Her passion for the subject is contagious, and she is very approachable.

Review.subject: Chemistry
Review.reviews: Dr. Garcia's classes are tough, and he moves through material too quickly.

Review.subject: English Literature
Review.reviews: She is very engaging and provides great insights into the readings.

Review.subject: History
Review.reviews: His storytelling makes history come alive. Best history professor I've had.

Review.subject: Psychology
Review.reviews: She is knowledgeable, but her lectures can be a bit dry.

Review.subject: Economics
Review.reviews: Dr. White provides real-world examples that make the material easier to understand.

Review.subject: Sociology
Review.reviews: She is very empathetic and encourages open discussions in class.

Review.subject: Philosophy
Review.reviews: His lectures are confusing, and it's hard to get clear answers to questions.

Review.subject: Art History
Review.reviews: She has a deep understanding of art and shares fascinating insights.

Review.subject: Political Science
Review.reviews: Dr. Walker is knowledgeable, but his exams are very difficult.

Review.subject: Engineering
Review.reviews: She is brilliant and very supportive. Her classes are challenging but rewarding.

Review.subject: Statistics
Review.reviews: He makes statistics interesting and provides lots of practice problems.

Review.subject: Nursing
Review.reviews: Dr. Wright is caring and an excellent teacher. She prepares students well for clinicals.

Review.subject: Music
Review.reviews: His passion for music is evident, and he encourages creativity.

Review.subject: Theater
Review.reviews: Her classes are enjoyable, but she can be very strict with grading.

Review.subject: Anthropology
Review.reviews: He is very knowledgeable and encourages students to think critically.

Review.subject: Linguistics
Review.reviews: She is very clear and concise in her explanations, making complex topics easier to understand.
